unnormalised: **Automotive Buzz: Traffic Rules Getting a Festive Revamp!**
normalised: Automotive Buzz: Traffic Rules Getting a Festive Revamp!

unnormalised: Hey folks, buckle up! Just heard that the Bangalore traffic police are rolling out some new rules, right before Onam celebrations kick off. Looks like they're cracking down hard on helmetless riding and triple-riding, with fines potentially hitting a spicy Rs. 2000!
normalised: Hey folks, buckle up! Just heard that the Bangalore traffic police are rolling out some new rules, right before Onam celebrations kick off. Looks like they're cracking down hard on helmetless riding and triple-riding, with fines potentially hitting a spicy rupees two thousand!

unnormalised: Apparently, they're also serious about those rash driving incidents we've all witnessed, especially around Indiranagar. Expect more check posts and stricter enforcement of speed limits – you know, the usual 40-50 km in most city areas.
normalised: Apparently, they're also serious about those rash driving incidents we've all witnessed, especially around Indiranagar. Expect more check posts and stricter enforcement of speed limits – you know, the usual forty to fifty kilometer in most city areas.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the authorities want to make the roads safer during the festive season. No one wants to spoil their biryani and Onam sadhya by getting into an accident, right?
normalised: Word on the street is that the authorities want to make the roads safer during the festive season. No one wants to spoil their biryani and Onam sadhya by getting into an accident, right?

unnormalised: The new regulations also include updated guidelines for vehicle parking, especially near commercial hubs like Koramangala. Keep an eye out for those 'No Parking' signs!
normalised: The new regulations also include updated guidelines for vehicle parking, especially near commercial hubs like Koramangala. Keep an eye out for those 'No Parking' signs!

unnormalised: So, drive safe, obey the rules, and let's all have a happy and hassle-free Onam! Stay safe, Bangalore! Don't get fined; get festive!
normalised: So, drive safe, obey the rules, and let's all have a happy and hassle-free Onam! Stay safe, Bangalore! Don't get fined; get festive!
